text:
="preserve">Isidora Žebeljan (27 September 1967 – 29 September 2020) was a Serbian composer and conductor. She was a professor of composition at the Belgrade Music Academy. She was a member of the Serbian Academy of Sciences and Arts. She won many national awards for her music, among them the Stevan Mokranjac National Music Award in 2004. Žebeljan was born in Belgrade.
Žebeljan died on 29 September 2020 in Belgrade at the age of 53.

annotations.surface_form: Serbian Academy of Sciences and Arts
